summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Flowitec Go & Grow LMS. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has mixed content security issues preventing some API calls from working properly.

integration_issues.issue: Mixed Content Error - Frontend making HTTP requests to HTTPS backend
integration_issues.details: Browser blocks HTTP requests from HTTPS pages. Error: 'Mixed Content: The page at 'https://course-registry-5.preview.emergentagent.com/admin/courses' was loaded over HTTPS, but requested an insecure XMLHttpRequest endpoint 'http://flowitec-lms.preview.emergentagent.com/api/courses/'

passed_tests: Backend: Quiz creation with multiple question types
Frontend: Module and lesson management UI

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (partial functionality due to API integration issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix mixed content security issue in frontend. The frontend is making HTTP requests instead of HTTPS requests to the backend API, causing browser to block requests. Environment variable REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL is correctly set to HTTPS, but some API calls are still using HTTP. Need to investigate and fix API URL configuration inconsistency.
